MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow, affecting properties in Auldhill Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 00:05AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:07AM on 04 November 2020.
